name: **Maguins Island**
description: Maguins Island G605-387 Sheet 16 A piece of sand and dune separated equally from the Strandhill side to the S (beyond Sligo Airport) and Coney (the beautiful W beach on) to the N. Lacking any obvious merit, Maguins may be waded to from either side at LW. A rocky reef runs NE and S from the W tip, barring entrance except at higher waters. Nettles, no camping found. Oyster
